speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mike from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Jessica?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Jessica. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance with City Credit. Before I provide any details, could you please confirm your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Jessica. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, I appreciate your cooperation. You have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to handle this?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay $100 today and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That works. I’ll note the payment of $100 today. Can I set up the payment method?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, you can charge my credit card.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. Could you please provide the card number and expiration date?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Your payment has been processed. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

speaker: Customer
text: No, that’s all for now. Thank you!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Jessica. Have a great day!
